content: the urbino tribunal has issued a final decision in a legal case regarding the dissolution of joint ownership of a building in urbino italy the decision states that one party will be assigned the entire property and must pay 47000000 euros to the other party as an equalization payment the courtappointed expert witness confirmed that the property can be divided without significant expenses the estimated value of the property is 94000000 euros the decision clarifies that the ownership of the property will be assigned to one party and the excess share will also be allocated to that party the court rejects a request to defer the payment of the equalization amount the costs of the case including the expert opinion will be divided between the parties the decision was made by the judge on 10132022
